paramInformation.label: Dim Level Sent via Basic Set
Temperature Trigger ON Value
paramInformation.description: Temperature level when a ON command is sent out. Allowable range -20..50, 99.

paramInformation.label: Temperature Trigger OFF Value
paramInformation.description: Temperature level when a OFF command is sent out. Allowable range -20..50, 99.

paramInformation.label: Humidity Trigger ON Value
paramInformation.description: Humidity level when a ON command is sent out. Allowable range 20..90, 99.

paramInformation.label: Humidity Trigger OFF Value
paramInformation.description: Humidity level when a OFF command is sent out. Allowable range 20..90, 99.

paramInformation.label: Auto Report Time
paramInformation.description: Sets the time interval when a sensor report is sent

paramInformation.label: Auto Report Temperature
paramInformation.description: Sets the temperature change causing a sensor report.

paramInformation.label: Auto Report Humidity
paramInformation.description: Sets the humidity change causing a sensor report. Allowable range: 0, 5..70.
